## End-to-End Site Start-Up Workflow

```{mermaid}
flowchart LR
  A[Site Identification] --> B[Feasibility Assessment]
  B --> C[Site Selection]
  C --> D[Regulatory Collection]
  D --> E[Site Initiation Visit]
  E --> F[Site Activation]
  F --> G[Enrollment Begins]
```

## CRA Focus Areas

- Regulatory document collection
- Training coordination
- System access (EDC/IRT)
- Activation readiness verification
